SELECT mno, email, phone, gender, address, postal_code AS postalCode, birth_date AS birthDate, profile_img_path AS profileImgPath, created_at, updated_at, last_login FROM member_details WHERE mno = #{mno}
SELECT mno, curator_no AS curatorNo, curator_img AS curatorImg, ad_grade, approved_at FROM curator WHERE mno = #{mno}
mapper.update: UPDATE member_details SET email = #{email}, phone = #{phone}, gender = #{gender, typeHandler=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.typehandler.GenericEnumTypeHandler, javaType=world.ssafy.tourtalk.model.dto.enums.Gender}, address = #{address}, postal_code = #{postalCode}, birth_date = #{birthDate}, profile_img_path = #{profileImgPath}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE mno = #{mno}

mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) > 0 FROM member WHERE id = #{id}
SELECT nickname FROM member WHERE mno = #{mno}

SELECT m.mno, m.id, m.nickname, m.role, m.status, m.points, d.email, d.phone, d.gender, d.address, d.postal_code AS postalCode, d.birth_date AS birthDate, d.profile_img_path AS profileImgPath, d.created_at, d.updated_at, d.last_login, c.curator_no AS curatorNo, c.curator_img AS curatorImg, c.ad_grade, c.approved_at FROM member m JOIN member_details d ON m.mno = d.mno LEFT JOIN curator c ON m.mno = c.mno WHERE m.mno = #{mno}
